name: Hype Group
tagline: St. Petersburg boutique brand building agency
description:
Hype Group was born a boutique design and marketing firm late in 2009.  Our goal is to provide industry experience and youthful talent, which in-turn enables us to produce fresh, innovative perspectives for our clients.
The team at Hype Group eats, sleeps and breathes creativity. It's what we do, and we do it well. They communicates creatively and efficiently. It is crucial to have a savvy team strategizing, coordinating and implementing your marketing and branding efforts.
